ARABIC: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your god is Allah alone, there is no god but Him. He encompasses all things in His knowledge.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your god is only God. There is no other god but He. His knowledge extends over everything."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Your God is none else than Allah, beside Whom there is no god. His knowledge embraces everything."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord is the One who is the only God and He has the knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Your God is only Allah – other than for Whom there is no worship; His knowledge encompasses all things.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Your God is only Allah, there is no God but Him. He has full knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Your Allah is only Allah, there is no god but He; He comprehends all things in (His) knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Your God is only the One God; there is no god, but He alone who in His knowledge embraces everything.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Your Allah is only Allah, than Whom there is no other Allah. He embraceth all things in His knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your only deity is God, there is no deity but Him. His knowledge encompasses all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Your God is only Allah, the One other than whom there is no god. He comprehendeth everything in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your God is Allah. There is no god except Him. He embraces all things in [His] knowledge.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the god of you all is the One Allah: there is no god but He: all things He comprehends in His knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Your Ilah (God) is only Allah, the One (La ilaha illa Huwa) (none has the right to be worshipped but He). He has full knowledge of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your God is only One, Allah. There is no god, except He, alone. His knowledge encompasses all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Surely your god is God, the One besides whom there is no other god. He comprehends everything in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:98] Indeed your God is the One God, than whom there is no other god. He embraces all things in [His] knowledge’ (‘ilman, a specification derived from the subject of the verb, in other words, it means ‘His knowledge embraces all things’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Your God is only Allah, than Whom there is no other God) He has no children or partners. (He embraceth all 345 things in His knowledge) He knows all things.
